lines.text: You know, sometimes I wonder why I keep you around.
Maybe it's because I own 50% of the stock.
Grandma used to say money can't buy happiness, but it sure is a most pleasant way of being miserable.
Don't worry, I'll bring him back dead or alive. Either way, he ought to look great.
What ever happened to your conscience?
I just had it washed. I can't do a thing with it.
